rows.label: qst104207_msg0001
rows.name:
Are you guys helping to build
the school too, Rex-niichan?

rows.label: qst104207_msg0002
rows.name:
Yay! Let's make it the best
school in all of Alst!

rows.label: qst104207_msg0101
rows.name:
I'm in charge of decorations!
I'm collecting fabrics, musical
instruments, art, and books!

rows.label: qst104207_msg0102
rows.name:
Did you bring something we
can use for decoration?

rows.label: qst104207_msg0121
rows.name:
I'm going to decorate it a
lot and make it lively! Still
accepting more stuff.

rows.label: qst104207_msg0141
rows.name: This should be enough! Thank you!

rows.label: qst104207_msg0161
rows.name:
I wonder where I should
put what... Thinking and
creating is so much fun!

rows.label: qst104207_msg0201
rows.name:
It's hard, but fun! This might
be more fun than studying...
